text: David Lawrence "Dave" Hlubek [ ] (August 28, 1951 â€“ September 3, 2017) was an American guitarist. He was the lead guitarist and founding member of the Southern rock band Molly Hatchet. He was born in Jacksonville, Florida. His best known song was "Flirtin' with Disaster". Hlubek died of a heart attack on September 3, 2017, at the age of 66. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:American rock guitarists Category:Musicians from Florida Category:Writers from Florida
title: Dave Hlubek
